product_name: Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - 2-Piece
long_description: Excellent on-the-water performance at an introductory price, the 2-piece Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle gets the whole family out on the water with a smile. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Fiji Adjustable stand up paddle telescopes to fit 3 size ranges: 70 - 77.5 in, 74 - 81.5 in and 80 - 87.5 in. Warm to the touch, even on cool mornings, a full fiberglass shaft helps keep weight to a minimum. The lightweight and durable fiberglass-reinforced nylon blade of the Werner Fiji can take whatever you throw at it. You can paddle all day without needing to be an expert thanks to the tear-drop shape that provides an immediate, powerful stroke. The perfect amount of flex in the shaft and blade keeps up performance without fatiguing the body. A unique palm grip gives maximum blade control while perfecting the forward stroke and bracing strokes. 2-piece design breaks down to make transport easy.
short_description: Excellent on-the-water performance at an introductory price, the 2-piece Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle gets the whole family out on the water with a smile.
